ValidationRule.description: Requires 7512 to be sent based on set criteria.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Changes", Account.CreatedBy.Profile.Name = "International Distributor Community", ISPICKVAL( Ship_Date_Change_30_days__c , "Yes"), OR ( ISPICKVAL( Change_Type__c , "Ship Date Change"), ISPICKVAL( Change_Type__c , "Expediting"), ISPICKVAL( Change_Type__c , "Add Item"), ISPICKVAL( Change_Type__c , "Remove Item"), ISPICKVAL( Change_Type__c , "Cancel") ), OR ( ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed - Approved"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed - Rejected") ), OR ( ISPICKVAL( X7512_Sent__c , "No"), ISPICKVAL( X7512_Sent__c , "") ) )
